verses.verse: Pursue<WG1377> love,<WG26> yet<WG1161> desire<WG2206> earnestly<WG2206> spiritual<WG4152> [gifts,] but especially<WG3123> that you may prophesy.<WG4395>

For one who speaks<WG2980> in a tongue<WG1100> does not speak<WG2980> to men,<WG444> but to God;<WG2316> for no<WG3762> one<WG3762> understands,<WG191> but in [his] spirit<WG4151> he speaks<WG2980> mysteries.<WG3466>
But one who prophesies<WG4395> speaks<WG2980> to men<WG444> for edification<WG3619> and exhortation<WG3874> and consolation.<WG3889>
One who speaks<WG2980> in a tongue<WG1100> edifies<WG3618> himself;<WG1438> but one who prophesies<WG4395> edifies<WG3618> the church.<WG1577>

Now<WG1161> I wish<WG2309> that you all<WG3956> spoke<WG2980> in tongues,<WG1100> but [even] more<WG3123> that you would prophesy;<WG4395> and greater<WG3173> is one who prophesies<WG4395> than<WG2228> one who speaks<WG2980> in tongues,<WG1100> unless<WG1487> <WG3361> he interprets,<WG1329> so<WG2443> that the church<WG1577> may receive<WG2983> edifying.<WG3619>

But now,<WG3568> brethren,<WG80> if<WG1437> I come<WG2064> to you speaking<WG2980> in tongues,<WG1100> what<WG5101> shall I profit<WG5623> you, unless<WG1437> <WG3361> I speak<WG2980> to you either<WG2228> by way<WG1722> of revelation<WG602> or<WG2228> of knowledge<WG1108> or<WG2228> of prophecy<WG4394> or<WG2228> of teaching<WG1322>?

Yet<WG3676> [even] lifeless<WG895> things,<WG895> either<WG1535> flute<WG836> or<WG1535> harp,<WG2788> in producing<WG1325> a sound,<WG5456> if<WG1437> they do not produce<WG1325> a distinction<WG1293> in the tones,<WG5353> how<WG4459> will it be known<WG1097> what is played<WG832> on the flute<WG832> or<WG2228> on the harp<WG2789>?
For if<WG1437> the bugle<WG4536> produces<WG1325> an indistinct<WG82> sound,<WG5456> who<WG5101> will prepare<WG3903> himself for battle<WG4171>?

So<WG3779> also<WG2532> you, unless<WG1437> <WG3361> you utter<WG1325> by the tongue<WG1100> speech<WG3056> that is clear,<WG2154> how<WG4459> will it be known<WG1097> what is spoken<WG2980>? For you will be speaking<WG2980> into the air.<WG109>
There are, perhaps,<WG5177> a great<WG5118> many<WG5118> kinds<WG1085> of languages<WG5456> in the world,<WG2889> and no<WG3762> [kind] is without<WG880> meaning.<WG880>

If<WG1437> then<WG3767> I do not know<WG3609> the meaning<WG1411> of the language,<WG5456> I shall be to the one who speaks<WG2980> a barbarian,<WG915> and the one who speaks<WG2980> will be a barbarian<WG915> to me.
So<WG3779> also<WG2532> you, since<WG1893> you are zealous<WG2207> of spiritual<WG4151> [gifts,] seek<WG2212> to abound<WG4052> for the edification<WG3619> of the church.<WG1577>
Therefore<WG1352> let one who speaks<WG2980> in a tongue<WG1100> pray<WG4336> that he may interpret.<WG1329>
For if<WG1437> I pray<WG4336> in a tongue,<WG1100> my spirit<WG4151> prays,<WG4336> but my mind<WG3563> is unfruitful.<WG175>

What<WG5101> is [the outcome] then<WG3767>? I shall pray<WG4336> with the spirit<WG4151> and I shall pray<WG4336> with the mind<WG3563> also;<WG2532> I shall sing<WG5567> with the spirit<WG4151> and I shall sing<WG5567> with the mind<WG3563> also.<WG2532>

Otherwise<WG1893> if<WG1437> you bless<WG2127> in the spirit<WG4151> [only,] how<WG4459> will the one who fills<WG378> the place<WG5117> of the ungifted<WG2399> say<WG3004> the "Amen<WG281>" at your giving<WG2169> of thanks,<WG2169> since<WG1894> he does not know<WG3609> what<WG5101> you are saying<WG3004>?
For you are giving<WG2168> thanks<WG2168> well<WG2573> enough,<WG2573> but the other<WG2087> man<WG2087> is not edified.<WG3618>
I thank<WG2168> God,<WG2316> I speak<WG2980> in tongues<WG1100> more<WG3123> than you all;<WG3956>

however,<WG235> in the church<WG1577> I desire<WG2309> to speak<WG2980> five<WG4002> words<WG3056> with my mind,<WG3563> that I may instruct<WG2727> others<WG243> also,<WG2532> rather<WG2228> than<WG2228> ten<WG3463> thousand<WG3463> words<WG3056> in a tongue.<WG1100>
Brethren,<WG80> do not be children<WG3813> in your thinking;<WG5424> yet<WG235> in evil<WG2549> be babes,<WG3515> but in your thinking<WG5424> be mature.<WG5046>

In the Law<WG3551> it is written,<WG1125> "By men<WG2084> of strange<WG2084> tongues<WG2084> and by the lips<WG5491> of strangers<WG2087> I will speak<WG2980> to this<WG3778> people,<WG2992> and even<WG3761> so<WG3779> they will not listen<WG1522> to Me," says<WG3004> the Lord.<WG2962>

So<WG5620> then<WG5620> tongues<WG1100> are for a sign,<WG4592> not to those<WG3588> who believe,<WG4100> but to unbelievers;<WG571> but prophecy<WG4394> [is for a sign], not to unbelievers,<WG571> but to those<WG3588> who believe.<WG4100>

If<WG1437> therefore<WG3767> the whole<WG3650> church<WG1577> should assemble<WG4905> together<WG1909> <WG3588> <WG846> and all<WG3956> speak<WG2980> in tongues,<WG1100> and ungifted<WG2399> men<WG2399> or<WG2228> unbelievers<WG571> enter,<WG1525> will they not say<WG3004> that you are mad<WG3105>?

But if<WG1437> all<WG3956> prophesy,<WG4395> and an unbeliever<WG571> or<WG2228> an ungifted<WG2399> man<WG2399> enters,<WG1525> he is convicted<WG1651> by all,<WG3956> he is called<WG350> to account<WG350> by all;<WG3956>

the secrets<WG2927> of his heart<WG2588> are disclosed;<WG5318> and so<WG3779> he will fall<WG4098> on his face<WG4383> and worship<WG4352> God,<WG2316> declaring<WG518> that God<WG2316> is certainly<WG3689> among<WG1722> you.

What<WG5101> is [the outcome] then,<WG3767> brethren<WG80>? When<WG3752> you assemble,<WG4905> each<WG1538> one<WG1538> has<WG2192> a psalm,<WG5568> has<WG2192> a teaching,<WG1322> has<WG2192> a revelation,<WG602> has<WG2192> a tongue,<WG1100> has<WG2192> an interpretation.<WG2058> Let all<WG3956> things<WG3956> be done<WG1096> for edification.<WG3619>

If<WG1535> anyone<WG5100> speaks<WG2980> in a tongue,<WG1100> [it should be] by two<WG1417> or<WG2228> at the most<WG4183> three,<WG5140> and [each] in turn,<WG3313> and let one<WG1520> interpret;<WG1329>
but if<WG1437> there is no<WG3361> interpreter,<WG1328> let him keep<WG4601> silent<WG4601> in the church;<WG1577> and let him speak<WG2980> to himself<WG1438> and to God.<WG2316>
And let two<WG1417> or<WG2228> three<WG5140> prophets<WG4396> speak,<WG2980> and let the others<WG243> pass<WG1252> judgment.<WG1252>
But if<WG1437> a revelation<WG601> is made<WG601> to another<WG243> who is seated,<WG2521> let the first<WG4413> keep<WG4601> silent.<WG4601>
For you can<WG1410> all<WG3956> prophesy<WG4395> one<WG2596> <WG1520> by one,<WG2596> <WG1520> so<WG2443> that all<WG3956> may learn<WG3129> and all<WG3956> may be exhorted;<WG3870>
and the spirits<WG4151> of prophets<WG4396> are subject<WG5293> to prophets;<WG4396>
for God<WG2316> is not [a God] of confusion<WG181> but of peace,<WG1515> as in all<WG3956> the churches<WG1577> of the saints.<WG40>

Let the women<WG1135> keep<WG4601> silent<WG4601> in the churches;<WG1577> for they are not permitted<WG2010> to speak,<WG2980> but let them subject<WG5293> themselves, just<WG2531> as the Law<WG3551> also<WG2532> says.<WG3004>

And if<WG1487> they desire<WG2309> to learn<WG3129> anything,<WG5100> let them ask<WG1905> their own<WG2398> husbands<WG435> at home;<WG3624> for it is improper<WG150> for a woman<WG1135> to speak<WG2980> in church.<WG1577>
Was it from you that the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> [first] went<WG1831> forth<WG1831>? Or<WG2228> has it come<WG2658> to you only<WG3441>?

If<WG1487> anyone<WG5100> thinks<WG1380> he is a prophet<WG4396> or<WG2228> spiritual,<WG4152> let him recognize<WG1921> that the things which<WG3739> I write<WG1125> to you are the Lord's commandment.<WG1785>
But if<WG1487> anyone<WG5100> does not recognize<WG50> [this], he is not recognized.<WG50>
Therefore,<WG5620> my brethren,<WG80> desire<WG2206> earnestly<WG2206> to prophesy,<WG4395> and do not forbid<WG2967> to speak<WG2980> in tongues.<WG1100>
But let all<WG3956> things<WG3956> be done<WG1096> properly<WG2156> and in an orderly<WG5010> manner.<WG5010>
